document.full_text: nigeria's security agencies launched an investigation on monday into a series of bombings which killed at least 14 people hours after president goodluck jonathan was sworn into office on sunday.
document.title: nigeria investigates bombs after jonathan sworn in
lines_and_colors: nigeria's security agencies launched an investigation on monday into a series of bombings which killed at least 14 people hours after president goodluck jonathan was sworn into office on sunday.
